title: How do some people manage to acquire a vast amount of knowledge on many topics in a very short span of time? - Quora

response.answer_text: More Amount of knowledge …so many topics ..and short span.. So the this 3 things ideally does not go together but what I think can make this 3 things to bond together are.. 1) Analysis-analysis of two things what you want to learn?and how much time do you have? 2)Plan-Plan based on how you are going to do this based on the analysis .. Some steps that we can take- Manage energy not time as we cannot increase the time but we can definitely increase the energy that we can use to acquire the knowledge.Not only smart work but smart execution is also very important so how you choose your topics for example-If we choose linked topics … it will save our time from pre reading some concepts that we need.Improving our comprehensive skills as well as skills of processing the content not only as a therory approach but by trying to find it around ourselves.
